welcome_message_body: Welcome to Papagos, Greece! Get ready to immerse yourself in the charm of this beautiful city known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and experiencing everything Papagos has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Athens International Airport is the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Satellite Terminal
terminals.description: The satellite terminal at Athens International Airport serves as an extension to the main terminal, providing additional gates and services for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free Wi-Fi network by selecting 'ATH Free Wi-Fi' from the list of available networks and following the prompts to connect.
